Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Navigation system GPS signal loss. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 17/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
